tha-ap542:11.4: daḷhaṃ kaṇhāsi sā → daḷhaṃ kaṇhā siyā (si) | ḍayhakaṇhā silā (s2, s3) | daḷhakaṇhā siyā (pts1)
tha-ap542:28.3: Diṭṭhiṃ no → diṭṭhiṃ ne (bj) | diṭṭhaṃ no (si) | diṭṭhinte (s2, s3) | diṭṭhi no (pts1)
tha-ap542:33.4: vātarogehi pīḷito → vācāyābhisupīḷito (s2, s3, pts1) | vātarogī supīḷito (mr)
